surface_layer.definition: The part of the physical layer (PHY) that is responsible for the logical signaling and protocol aspects.

deep_layer.mechanism: The Logical PHY layer handles tasks such as equalization protocol and the interpretation of reserved bits.
deep_layer.origin: Part of the PCIe protocol stack's physical layer architecture.

epistemic_metadata.source: PCIe® 5.0 Protocol and Electrical Compliance Testing Deep Dive
